name: A Sith's Plans
Lore: 'The Imperial fleet keeps a tight grip on the systems under its control. Abuses and excesses by local citizens are not tolerated.',
Text: 'Deploy on a site. Sunsdown is canceled. While you have 8 or fewer cards in hand, non-unique characters (except clones), vehicles, starships, weapons, and devices are immune to Grimtaash. Once per turn, may use 2 Force to deploy a non-war room battleground planet location (except a sector) not on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. [Immune to Alter]',
